rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language ('is the first time', 'did not work', 'has tested positive', 'is the 14th case', 'reported') to report the case.
The segment contains factual statements, not a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports factual findings without explicit calming language.
The segment uses 'the first time', 'any poultry or dairy farms', and 'the 14th human bird flu case' which are not Q6 cues.
The segment contains the bare negation 'who did not work with any poultry or dairy farms' without explicit calming.
